H picks it up and begins to draw in the sand. The Light Fury opens an eye, and then the other, squintin curiosity. Toothless works feverishly, going over his lines repeated brushing sand over them with his tail when he makes a mistake. Curious, the Light Fury drops from her perch and slowly approaches, tilting her head, taking it in, amused. As he finishes, Toothless steps back to reveal a childish portr of the Light Fury etched in the shimmering sand. Toothless adds a smile, completing the portrait. Hiccup is baffled by the display.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Oh, now you can draw? She steps on one of Toothless’ lines in the sand. He snar reactively -- but she snarls back, sharply. He recoils apologetically. She crosses over the drawing toward Toothless... and touches his nose with hers. Toothless be a dopey grin. The Light Fury turns and flaps off, attempting to lead hi away. Toothless tries to follow, but crashes down into th sand and rocks repeatedly due to his unmanned tail. The Light Fury circles, waiting for him to take wing, confused. Toothless tries desperately to join her, but cannot. The Light Fury spots Hiccup, spying from the bushes, and flies off with a snort, as Toothless dives after her, distraught. He lands in the water and looks mournfully af her, half submerged. He glares at his useless tail, and s it down into the water. He hangs his head. Hiccup watches from above, looking guilt-ridden. He gets idea.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 56.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sequence 1801 - Automatic Tail Astrid walks up, eyeing schematic drawings of a new prosthetic tail, pinned up on a wall. She studies them curiously.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Oh, someone hasn’t slept. Hiccup grabs a handful of black Toothless scales and drop them into a mortar. He mashes them up with a pestle.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Well, that Light Fury won’t let me within a mile of her. And neither of us will be getting any sleep or finding the Hidden World until Toothless takes over. Hiccup is toiling away at a makeshift workbench as Toothl hovers over him, panting. As Hiccup peers through a magnifying glass, Toothless pushes his face aside to look steaming up the glass.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey! What do you think of that? Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: You tried this once before. He didn’t want it.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Until now, he didn’t have a reason to. Right, bud? Hiccup holds up the mortar to Toothless. On cue, Toothles SPITS into it, adding slobber to the mixture. Astrid smiles. Hiccup grabs a paintbrush and meets her ey

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: No, nothing. I’m impressed. I mean, look at you, embracing change. I’m proud of you. Hiccup shrugs, painting the tail.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 57.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Well, he’s my best bud. I want him to be happy. (beat) Besides, it’s just until he brings her back. Astrid rolls her eyes. Hiccup finishes coating the tail i paint. He lifts and splays it in front of Toothless. Toothless GURGLES in awe.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Alright. Fire when ready! Toothless produces a small fireball. It washes over the paint, drying it instantly. He then holds it up for Toothless, who blasts it with fir He folds the tail, revealing Gobber, covered in soot and glowing embers.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Well. I guess you know the tail is fireproof. Hiccup cringes as Toothless runs around, frantically.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Okay, Toothless! Okay, yes I know, I know -- shh shh shh. Okay, I know. He attempts to fit the new prosthetic as Toothless wags h tail excitedly.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Please. This is not helping. Eret walks up, carrying an armload of construction logs.

dialogues.speaker: ERET
dialogues.text: Well, well, well! Someone’s excited.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Fresh off of his first date. Now, he’s love-crazed.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Only WE’RE the ones going crazy. The sooner he brings back that Light Fury, the better!  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 58.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Yeah but to do that, he'll need to fly without me. So time to give this new-and-improved baby a shot. Toothless dances in place, excitedly. Hiccup straddles hi tail, bracing it between his legs, and attaches the prosthetic, affixing the matching brace to Toothless’ nat half-tail.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Attaboy! Lookin’ sharp, Toothless! So, what do you think, bud? Toothless flares, tilts, and collapses his half-tail. The automatic prosthetic mirrors every movement with geared precision.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bring her home. (aping Stoick) By sundown at the latest. Toothless smiles, gurgling excitedly. He wipes a slobbery tongue across his face.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Pfft! Save it for your girlfriend! Go on, get out of here! Toothless bounds off -- then pauses, suddenly aware of th magnitude of his newly gifted independence. He turns back Hiccup, looking uncertain.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It’s okay. Toothless smiles, and with an eager down-flap, he takes w racing off into the sky -- awkwardly at first. After a fe wobbly maneuvers, he gets the hang of it and flaps off wi grace. Toothless vanishes into the distance. Hiccup’s smile fade leaving him stirring awkwardly. He limps off as Gobber an Eret avert their eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sequence 1871 - Spy Mission  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 59. Valka and Cloudjumper cruise over a cloudy sky. Below, fo covers the open sea like a blanket. A break in the fog reveals a lone ship below. Valka steer Cloudjumper toward it. As they descend toward it, the thinning fog reveals a vast armada at sea. Valka takes it concerned. Her gaze moves up to see a strange FLOATING AIRSHIP hovering menacingly. Suddenly, a Deathgripper explodes of the fog, tackling Cloudjumper, mid-air! Valka is knocked from her standing position. She hooks he staff to Cloudjumper’s crown of spikes and swings to a ro landing on his flank. A second Deathgripper attacks from other side, its exposed tusks gashing Cloudjumper’s side barely missing Valka. It raises its scorpion-like tail, exposing the glistening barb.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: Watch out! It strikes! Valka parries, knocking the barb shy of its target. One of the Deathgrippers clamps down onto Cloudjumper’s wing with its serrated pincers. Cloudjumper grabs it in its massive talons and rips it free, tearing gash in his own wing. VALKA (CONT’D) Go, Cloudjumper! Cloudjumper flaps off in retreat. The Deathgrippers CACKL and give chase, but suddenly halt as a distant, piercing whistle sounds out. They obediently retreat as Cloudjumpe flees. ON GRIMMEL, watching as Cloudjumper and Valka recede into fog.

dialogues.speaker: SQ. 2001
dialogues.text: As a band of yellow glows on the horizon, Toothless thund through the sky, searching high and low. He spots a shado dimly cast against passing clouds, and doubles back, only realize that it’s his own. He BLASTS A FIREBALL, frustrat and flaps along listlessly, tired and discouraged. At length, he banks and turns around, defeated. Head hung low, he glides through a blanket of cloud.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 60. His ear plates twitch at the sound of a distant explosion twists his head around and lights up, hopeful. He looks around, twitching his plates, desperate for any of the Light Fury. Detecting something, he turns to his s The Light Fury materializes, head to tail, out of thin ai her mirror-like scales cooling in the wind. Toothless exclaims, ecstatic, showing off his new tail. S peels off, coyly. Toothless gives chase, determined not t lose her again. She looks at him before blasting a ball of fire and flyin through it, as if to say, “Watch! I’1l teach you”. Toothl chases her into the fiery funnel, close on her tail. When emerges from it, she’s gone -- once again disappeared. Toothless looks every which way, then spots her far above heaving her wings into a storm cloud. Toothless jackknife skyward and pours on the speed, catching up in the flashi thunderhead. As lightning crackles all around, Toothless tries to replicate the Light Fury’s cloaking ability. He blasts a fireball and flies through it. He looks at himself as he emerges -- nothing’s changed. She shows him again, firing another blast and diving through it, disappearing with gr She reappears moments later by his side, chortling: “Try harder. You can do it.” Brow furrowed in determination, Toothless inhales deeply blasts a larger fireball. He dives through it, but once a emerges unchanged. Toothless is embarrassed; he so clearl wants to impress her. He ‘blushes’ glowing blue and ROARS frustration. Suddenly, his rage draws the surrounding electricity of t thunderhead. Lightning bolts strike him from every direct producing a blinding flash. As it dissipates, he’s gone. Light Fury looks around, concerned. She calls out. Nothing. Then, as her panic sets in, Toothless reappears the distance, his own scales cooling off. He spirals, diz and dazed. The Light Fury races to him, elated, exclaimin “You did it!” She bolsters him as he smiles, groggy but proud, clearly sapped by the jolting experience. Together, they pierce the top of the thunderhead, rotatin around one another, face to face. They reach their apex a cease flapping, slowing to a halt against a crescent moon Toothless leans in, nuzzling her, nose to nose, while the hang momentarily. He steals a kiss -- a quick lick.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 61. Her eyes flare, surprised by his cheekiness, as she falls backward into an inverted swan-dive, wings outstretched. Toothless mirrors her. Their silhouettes peel apart again the pale moon as they spiral into a free fall, sounding o in glee. As layers of cloud pass them by, the Light Fury gracefull arcs over the water. Toothless glides beside her, beaming dopey, gummy smile. She extends her wing tip to touch his own. They glide, side by side, hand in hand. He coos, reveling in the moment. She steers Toothless toward a distant column of mist, ris into the night. They climb, higher and higher as the curi sight takes on definition. Through the column of mist, Toothless spies what appears be a gargantuan hole in the sea (created by an undersea volcano meeting the surface). Immense waterfalls form a n perfect circle, roaring thunderously into a chasm of epic proportion. It appears to be a mile wide, maybe more. As Toothless squints, perplexed, the Light Fury turns to uttering softly: “My home.” He stares at her, nodding in understanding. He gurgles back: “Take me there.” She grabs hold of his talons, surprising Toothless. Toget they tumble through the air like fighting eagles, dizzily plunging into the mist of the vast hole... and disappeari into its mysterious depths.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SQ. 2151 - Recon Report

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pair of tankards smash together. Frothy mead spills everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: TO THE CHIEF
dialogues.text: Roaring WHOOPS fill the air. Hiccup is jostled on the shoulders of merry Vikings, carried through the toasting crowd. They toss him up in the air in celebration, sendin him higher with each throw.

dialogues.speaker: ACK
dialogues.text: To the chief!  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 62.

dialogues.speaker: PHLEGMA
dialogues.text: Oh, a chip off the old block!

dialogues.speaker: SPITELOUT
dialogues.text: Stoick would be proud! As sun sets on New Berk, a feast rages in full swing. A bonfire roars in the center of the plaza. Buildings stand mid-construction as the raucous Berkians celebrate the da work in true Viking fashion. Dragons join in on the fun.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: (mid-air) Okay guys, now I’m just getting sick. They set Hiccup down. He laughs halfheartedly and stumble stifling some vomit. Gobber scoops him close, throwing hi prosthetic mug attachment around Hiccup, spilling mead al over him.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Gotta say, I thought you were well off yer rocker, but this spot ain’t half bad.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: This was supposed to be a temporary solution. Eret walks up, taking in the merriment with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: ERET
dialogues.text: It’s unanimous, everyone agrees we've definitely traded up. Well done, Chief. Hiccup laughs nervously, but continues eyeing the sky, an his mind elsewhere.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: What if the tail broke? What if Grimmel found him? What if he needs me? Gobber swipes a tankard of mead from a passing Viking and shoves it in Hiccup’s hands.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Would you relax? He’s probably having the time of his life.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 63.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: How would I know? She never comes around. And when she does, she’s always rushing off. (beat) I’m saying, how do we know if she’s right for us? Gobber raises an eyebrow.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Us? Hiccup shrugs off Gobber’s arm and hands the tankard to another passing Viking. He takes it happily, swilling as staggers off.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: You know what I mean. She’s so wild and skittish. I’m just gonna say it -- I don’t trust her. Gobber laughs heartily.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Can’t tame ‘em all, Hiccup. One day, you'll have to snip those apron strings and let Toothless stretch his wings. Reminds me of a talk I had with Stoick about you. The advice sits poorly with Hiccup. Gobber notices a pack Hobgobblers, eyeing him from the bushes, their blank eyes glimmering in the light of the bonfire.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Gah! Where do they keep coming from?!

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Who? Hiccup glances at the underbrush. They’re gone.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Those bloody Hobgobblers! I swear they're popping up faster than rabbits. Hiccup grins, shaking his head.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 64.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (whispered) I think they want to eat me. Evidence would suggest I’m tasty. He wiggles his prosthetic arm and wooden leg as proof. Tuffnut pops in from out of nowhere, startling them.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Hiccy. A moment? Listen, I’ve been watching you walk. Lose the limp. No one’s gonna marry that.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: I have a prosthetic leg.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: So have I!

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: And I have a parasitic twin, but you don’t see me limping around about it. C’mon. They continue to walk back toward the village. Gobber tra behind, still looking around anxiously. He glances back o his shoulder and suddenly, the pathway is full of Hobgobb again. He yelps and runs off.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Chin up, Hiccy. Puff out that chest. Move that butt to the left a little bit. Suddenly, Cloudjumper flaps past them. He comes to a land in the center of the plaza, clearly injured. Valka dismou looking disheveled. Hiccup heads over, concerned.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Mom! Are you hurt? What happened out there? Astrid joins, looking alarmed.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: I don’t know how, but Grimmel is tracking us.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Gah! This is all because of the Hobgobblers!  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 65.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: He has a hundred ships - maybe more. With enough cages for all of our dragons. Hiccup’s brow furrows as he tries to come up with a plan.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: (takes a deep breath) If Grimmel is leading them here, we have to take him out of the mix.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Uh, and how would we do that?

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: By going there to capture him.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Capture him? The group goes silent, grimacing at the dubious plan.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. RAVEN POINT TRAPPERS’ FORT - NIGHT Sequence 2181 - Trap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A jar -- with a patch of leather stretched over the mouth it. A thin, sharp spike pierces the taut skin. Venom drip from it into the container. RACK to reveal Grimmel, watching through the warbled glas He grins. PULL BACK to reveal a Deathgripper, obediently retracting scorpion-like tail and glistening, exposed stinger. Grimm carries the jar to a broken down bench in the ruins of a forgotten old fort. He removes the leather seal and carefully pours the venom into several dismantled darts. He WHISTLES, calmly reassembling them in the glow of an oil lamp.

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE
dialogues.text: HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 66. Shapes blur past. In the distance, dragon silhouettes fly to the water, coasting silently, then arcing up as they r the rocks. Hiccup sits behind Astrid on Stormfly. Astrid turns to Hiccup, and he nods. Hiccup dives from Stormfly, throwing open his wing-suit to glide and break his fall.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE GROUND
dialogues.text: Hiccup touches down with a quiet thud, then rises, quickl stowing his wings. He looks around, counting his team as stand, each dressed in dragon armor, stowing their own wi flaps. He gestures to split up. Astrid nods, then scurrie the rocks toward the glowing window.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE
dialogues.text: Grimmel lifts his hand and gestures toward the door, and Deathgrippers rise and scuttle out of the room, sniffing air and hissing, entering... THE FOYER, a large open beamed room, though most of its b have caved in forming a crisscrossed, disheveled maze. Wreckage litters the floor. Moonlight spills in from demolished walls. The Deathgrippers HISS in unison, tusks extending from th heavy jaws. They spilt up, searching the area, keenly awa of the intruders and determined to hunt them down.

dialogues.speaker: SNOTLOUT
dialogues.text: (whispered) Okay, split up. We'll be harder to catch. The group completely ignores Snotlout.

dialogues.speaker: ERET
dialogues.text: (whispered) I was thinking we should split up. Just because.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: (whispered) I like your instincts. They rush off together, leaving Snotlout behind.

dialogues.speaker: SNOTLOUT
dialogues.text: What is this?! Hiccup and his team dart between lumps of wreckage, climb and slipping out of view each time a Deathgripper rounds corner, narrowly evading detection.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 67. Hiccup points to the lit doorway, indicating the target. Above, Hiccup carefully creeps up the crumbling stairway leads to the lamp-lit room. He retrieves his dragon blade rushes up the steps... finding it empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A slender hand, pulling a rope. Suddenly, nets drops from the turret, cascading down in e direction. In one fell swoop, Hiccup and his team are tra inside with the Deathgrippers. Hiccup looks around, panicked. Fishmeat wakes and starts WAIL. Hiccup glares at Fishlegs, shaking his head.

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS
dialogues.text: (flustered) Shhh! Shhhh! Quiet! A match strikes, lighting a lantern. Grimmel steps into v on the other side of the nets.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: Where’s your dragon when you need him, hmm, Chief? Must have forgotten all about you. Hiccup and the others rise from hiding, carefully eyeing HISSING Deathgrippers, looking for an escape route.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: First rule of the hunt! Separate the prey from its pack. You’ve just removed yourselves from the equation! The Deathgrippers close in on the prisoners awaiting Grimmel’s signal.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Why are you doing this?

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: Really? I didn’t think you cared. (with contempt) Well, unlike you, when I was a boy and I came upon a Night Fury, I killed it where it slept. That simple act of courage made me a hero in my village. (proudly) (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 68.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So I decided to kill every last one, bringing real peace to the people of this world. (beat) Until you came along, preaching that dragons are something other than thieves and murderers. Pffft. That nonsense dies now. Starting with you.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: But you have dragons of your own. Grimmel LAUGHS.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: These? They’re dragon killers, drugged into obedience with their own venom. Not even your precious alpha could control them. They serve me and only me. (beat) Allow me to demonstrate. He WHISTLES. The Deathgrippers OPEN FIRE, blasting flaming acid in eve direction.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Take cover! The wreckage is instantly set aflame. Beams sizzle and sn dissolved by the acid.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Split up! Valka leaps out of the way of a blast, climbing a fallen toward the netted rooftop. She whirls her staff, creating urgent, high-pitched whistle.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: Up here! In response, Cloudjumper dives from the night sky, grabbi talon-fulls of netting and hoisting the ropes into the ai with her four powerful wings. Valka slashes the taut rope with her serrated, hooked staff, ripping a hole in the ne

dialogues.speaker: VALKA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hurry!  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 69. The team scrambles upward, climbing out of reach of the licking flames, as Stormfly, Meatlug, Skullcrusher, Hookf and Barf & Belch close in.

dialogues.speaker: SNOTLOUT
dialogues.text: Go, go, go, go, go! The Deathgrippers lunge after them, clawing their way up wreckage with their heavy pincers, snapping ferociously a their heels. As Valka stretches the hole wide, the team dives through, plummeting in mid air. Each is grabbed by their passing dragons.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: Hiccup! Lastly, Hiccup rushes through, glancing back at the infer beneath. A Deathgripper explodes from the flames like a breaching Great White. He leaps out of the way as it chom into the net, falling away, entangled. Valka hooks her st onto Cloudjumper’s talons and grabs Hiccup by the hand. VALKA (CONT’D) Gotcha. Go, Cloudjumper! Cloudjumper drops the net, allowing it to collapse upon t flaming wreckage, trapping the struggling the Deathgrippe as they writhe and ROAR in fury. The team escapes into the night sky as the GOREGUTTER fli in, following Fishlegs’ commands.

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS
dialogues.text: Yeah! Our hero! He lowers his head and uses his massive antlers to smash the top of the tower, causing the top to collapse down on the Deathgrippers. ON HICCUP, dangling, looking back. Sooty, eyes glazed, an rattled. ON GRIMMEL, watching them escape, seething. Ruffnut appea by his shoulder, brushing off ashes.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Ugh. He takes that stupid baby everywhere. He grimaces, unnerved.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sequence 2191 - We Need Him Stormfly touches down in the center plaza, carrying Astri and Hiccup, as Gobber approaches, grimacing.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Thor almighty! Guess we won’t be needing this then, huh? He gestures toward a handmade cage behind him. The return rescue team follows sheepishly, looking battered, sooty, disheveled on the heels of the botched mission.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: I led us right into his trap. Hiccup shakes his head, frustrated. Tuffnut SNICKERS.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Yeah, nice work, Chief. Right, Ruff? Silence. He looks over to see Barf’s empty saddle.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Wait. Where is Ruffnut? Tuffnut stares at the empty saddle, straining in thought.

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS
dialogues.text: (panicked) We left her behind?

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: How could you not notice she was missing? You ride a two-headed dragon.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Oh yeah. (beat) I feel like how Ruffnut is every day. Dumb.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Odin be spanked! This just gets better and better. Hiccup tries to calm the upset, VOCAL crowd.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 71. He SIGHS,

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: I try to avoid looking at her. It gives me acid reflux.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Okay, guys, just keep your helmets on. Toothless and I will fly--

dialogues.speaker: HOARK
dialogues.text: Toothless has the Light Fury now. He’s probably not even coming back.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: You gave him his freedom, Hiccup. What were you expecting?

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: I never thought he’d stay away for good. crestfallen.

dialogues.speaker: I..I...
dialogues.text: (beat) Look, I - I’1l figure it out. I just need more time. He shuffles off, defeated. Astrid watches Hiccup and SIGH Valka approaches.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: He thinks he has to lead alone, because his father had to. He doesn’t realize the strength you have together. Astrid turns to her. VALKA (CONT’D) Do you still believe in him?

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Of course. I wish he did. But he thinks he’s nothing without Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: Then help him realize the truth.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 72. BACK TO HICCUP, walking away from the crowd, rubbing his brow. He looks up to see Stormfly bounding up to him cheerily, with Astrid in the saddle. Stormfly SQWAKS, enthusiastically.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Get on. We’re going to find him. Hiccup lights up, relieved.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Really? He climbs onto the saddle, calling back to the weary crow

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Everybody stay put. We will get Ruffnut back. Don’t worry. He joins Astrid in the saddle as Stormfly takes to the ai

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Puh. Worry? If they’re stuck with Ruffnut, I’m more worried about them.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. RAVEN POINT TRAPPERS’ FORT - DAY Sequence 2195 - Ruffnut Freed Grimmel is looking down at his map, trying to concentrate

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Why the long face? She SNICKERS.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I mean, mine’s long, but yours is really long. All face and no brain. Like you got stretched at birth. Do you have a twin too? Tuffnut took up all the room in Mom’s belly. Otherwise I’d have a rounder head and more brains. That’s science. Grimmel sneers, trying to ignore her. The silent Warlords exchange glares of exhaustion. Ruffnut toys with her braids, weaving them around like snakes.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 73.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: My braids are like little Zipplebacks, see? Rawr rawr! Even the mold spots look like eyes. So cute. They even have little horns and everything, just like Barf and Belch, except me and Barf can’t stand Belch, so they’re really just Barfs. It’s warm in here. Grimmel shakes his head, unable to concentrate.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I know what you’re thinking. You've never had a prisoner this hot. All the boys love me. Except Eret, who totally lost his chance. That ship has sailed, boy. Sorry! And Hiccup is practically married to that round head, Astrid. But Snotlout and Fishlegs, they’re basically my harem. Grimmel breaks his pencil and groans.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I just can’t choose. Snotlout’s a beefcake, but almost too pretty, you know? Sometimes I think he’s more in love with himself than me. There’s only room for one beauty in this relationship. Fishlegs would keep me alive longer if I had to eat one of them, stranded on some glacier somewhere, but he never shuts up about dragons. Don’t you hate when people never stop talking?

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: Yes. I do. Grimmel’s captured dragon backs away from Ruffnut slowly, uncomfortable and slightly afraid.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: They just keep going and going BLAH, BLAH, BLAH. It’s so boring.

dialogues.speaker: GRISELDA THE GREVIOUS
dialogues.text: Can’t we just feed her to your dragons?  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 74.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Hey, what do you have to eat around here? I’m allergic to fish. You should know that. That’s all they have at that stupid new island. Grimmel raises his head from his hands, an idea suddenly dawning.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Do you have any clams? They’re like little mouths with slimy food inside that’s already chewed like the way Mom used to do it --

dialogues.speaker: -- ENOUGH
dialogues.text: Grimmel SWIPES the maps off of the table! The Warlords ju back. The compass sinks its spike into a mast, narrowly missing of the Deathgrippers. Grimmel stomps over to the cage.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Until I turned twelve, and she was like, “chew your own food!” And I was like, “No, I kinda like it!”

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: (grumbling) Most annoying creature ever to cross my path.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: (flattered) Aww. He throws open the latch and swings the cage door wide. Ruffnut snaps at him with her dragon-headed braids.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oops, you let the dragons out. I’m gonna get ya, I’m gonna get ya. No this one’s gonna get ya! He opens the adjacent cage. A timid dragon peeks his head out. The Deathgrippers scuttle over hungrily.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: Take him and go. Please. I beg you. (re: the dragon) The Deathgrippers will have to forgo dinner.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 75. Ruffnut saunters out, sizing up the dragon.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Eww. You feed your dragons... dragons?

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: Go!

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Where’s your bathroom? I gotta... He glares daggers.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: OKAY! Gods. No wonder you have gray hair. She climbs onto its back as the dragon looks around, confused.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Stress is not good for you. Ruffnut LAUGHS victoriously as they flap off.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So long, losers! Grimmel watches them go. His sneer becomes a grin.

dialogues.speaker: SQ. 2201
dialogues.text: Stormfly flies over the open water, following her nose an shifting course every few seconds as she carries Astrid a Hiccup. There’s nothing but open sky and ocean as far as eye can see.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Where is she heading?

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: She's tracking something, aren't you, Girl? She pats Stormfly, who SQWAKS back, focused, sniffing the air. Hiccup SIGHS.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 76.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: There’s nothing but miles and miles of... Hiccup looks into the distance, suddenly silent. Astrid turns to see what he’s looking at. They hurtle over crashing whitecaps toward what seems lik nothing but a column of mist. A ROAR builds. Hiccup peers over Astrid’s shoulder, baffled. They exchange looks. Stormfly suddenly pulls up, revealing a vast hole in the with thunderous waterfalls cascading inward. Hiccup and Astrid gawk, astounded, as Stormfly circles the epic, otherworldly sight -- a great volcanic caldera meeting th surface of the sea. The remains of shipwrecks litter the lower tier, wedged in the fang-like rocks of the chasm.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: A great waterfall...

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: At the end of the world. Astrid meets his eyes. Suddenly, without warning, Stormfl dives into the caldera.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Stormfly! Hiccup wraps his arms around Astrid as they plummet, uncontrolled.

dialogues.speaker: SQ. 2301
dialogues.text: They emerge through a curtain of falling water... and int vast, steamy chamber beneath the ocean floor. Terraced ba of collected seawater spill into a seemingly bottomless chasm, aglow with magma veins. Hiccup and Astrid gawk, bewildered, as Stormfly SNIFFS th air and switches direction.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 77. She flies them beneath a low overhang and into a tunnel. darkness gives way to an otherworldly glow as the phosphorescent river beneath throws patterns up the tunne walls.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Look! Hiccup points out the shape of a bioluminescent SEA SHOCK dragon, swimming in the currents below them. Stormfly follows the river to its end, dropping off of a cliff and into a massive gallery of columns, covered in bioluminescent fungi. Clusters of dragon eggs glow as Stormfly soars past. She too displays a bioluminescent pattern, as though flying under black lights. Astrid and Hiccup are astounded. The starry ceiling above suddenly shifts and undulates, a thousands of tiny FIREWORM dragons descend from the caver ceiling and playfully chase Stormfly. Finally, the “Mushroom Forest” gives way to a third chamb vast and glowing with warm light carried from deep magma veins via great pillars of crystal. Gargantuan coral structures fan out in dramatic displays, growing mid-air the damp, salty atmosphere. Here, THOUSANDS OF DRAGONS ha gathered in an excitable hive of activity. Astrid and Hiccup tuck low in the saddle as Stormfly flie them closer to the epicenter of activity -- “King Island. To avoid detection, Astrid steers Stormfly toward a small formation at the shore of Kind Island, landing in the cov of a canopy of goliath mushrooms. Hiccup and Astrid hop off and follow Stormfly as she snif the air and scampers up the steep, moist terrain.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It really does exist. Stormfly reaches a cliff and straightens, pointing her he like a hunting dog. Hiccup and Astrid crawl to the edge a GASP in unison. Rising from the gathered throngs of dragons, a great monu of crystal rises like a tower. From above, Toothless and Light Fury lead a procession of dragons through the air, zigging, zagging, and looping in a kind of arial dance.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Toothless!  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 78. Astrid yanks him back.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Shhh. You’1ll spook them! Toothless and the Light Fury land majestically upon the p of the crystal mountain. Dragons ROAR and flap their wing adulation. In the crowd, even Drago’s former BEWILDERBEAS pays his respects to the alpha. Toothless spreads his win and lets out a mighty roar.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (whispered) Now that’s a king. No longer the clumsy amateur, Toothless throws his head b clucking and mirroring the Light Fury in a strange yet beautiful ritual. He settles and nuzzles her gently, then looks out upon his constituents, noble as a lion with his pride. Below them, thousands of dragons lower their heads bow. All the while, Hiccup watches quietly, visibly unsettled the sight of Toothless so at home in this foreign world. Astrid notices. Her smiles fades, replaced by a look of sympathy. She reaches out to comfort him.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: We should go. But before they can slip away, they hear a RUMBLING behin them. They turn, apprehensively, only to find themselves TO FACE with a snarling RUMBLEHORN. HICCUP (CONT’D) ASTRID Oh no. Oh no. Hiccup raises his hand to try to calm the Rumblehorn, but Astrid grabs it and leaps from the cliff, taking Hiccup w her.

dialogues.speaker: STORMFLY
dialogues.text: The Rumblehorn ROARS, sending up a piercing alert.A thous dragon heads turn at once. Toothless is shocked to spot Hiccup and Astrid in the distance, fleeing for their live Toothless scrambles to the air in a panic, leaving the Li Fury confused. He ROARS at the pursuing dragons heading toward the intruders, with bared teeth and glowing mouths Some heed his command and fall back.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 79. Others are far ahead of Toothless and closing in. Hiccup Astrid scramble over the ever-changing terrain, trying to outrun them.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Go, go! Toothless races through the throng of aggressive dragons, COMMANDING them to back down. He swoops in and plucks Hic and Astrid out of the onrush, carrying them up toward the cavern ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, Bud! I-I just... Toothless BARKS back sharply and carries them into the distance, far from the agitated crowd. Stormfly follows, reuniting with Astrid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup’s face, remorseful and pensive, as Toothless flies away from the Hidden World...

dialogues.speaker: DISSOLVE TO
dialogues.text: INT. OLD BERK - STOICK’S HOUSE - NIGHT FLASHBACK Seq 2341- “With Love Comes Loss” Hiccup, age 6, descends the staircase from his bedroom lo to find Stoick seated by the fire. The stair creaks and Stoick turns with a start, quickly wiping glistening tear from his face.

dialogues.speaker: STOICK
dialogues.text: Son. You should be asleep. Hiccup sits on the steps guiltily, aware that he’s witnes something he shouldn't have.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: I was thirsty. Stoick softens and beckons Hiccup over with a sweep of hi hand.

dialogues.speaker: STOICK
dialogues.text: Yeah. Come here. Hiccup descends the last few steps and climbs into his father’s lap by the warmth of the hearth.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 80.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: (carefully) Dad? Are you gonna get us a new mom? Stoick stares at him, taken aback. He hugs Hiccup tightly then raises Hiccup’s chin to meet his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: STOICK
dialogues.text: I don’t want another. Your mum was the only woman for me. She was the love of my life. Hiccup turns to the flickering flames, considering his wo

dialogues.speaker: STOICK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But with love comes loss, son. It’s part of the deal. Sometimes it hurts, but in the end, it’s all worth it. Stoick smiles warmly.

dialogues.speaker: STOICK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: There’s no greater gift than love.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sequence 2371 - Momentary Hesitation

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup’s face as he rides on Toothless, still lost in thought. He glances at Astrid as they descend toward New to land. She eyes him sympathetically. They touch down on an open pasture by the shear cliffs, s distance from the halted construction. Hiccup dismounts a considers the village, then turns toward Toothless, who stirs, eyes downcast. Hiccup throws a glance toward Astrid, who nods in encouragement. He takes a DEEP BREATH and rounds Toothles face him.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: It’s okay, Bud. You belong there. With her. We don’t. Toothless cocks his head, seeming to understand.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 81. He COOS, clearly conflicted.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And that’s alright. We’ll find a way to mana-- Suddenly, Toothless’ ear plates twitch. He looks back tow the open pasture. The wind rustles through the long grass raises his head, curious. At first, he sees nothing... then a gust parts the grass blades, revealing the Light Fury crouched like a stalking lioness.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey! She followed us back! Toothless hops to his feet, elated. He bounds toward her, tongue flapping in a fit of joy. He leaps into the air an tackles her into the grass. They tumble down the bluff, h over tail, GURGLING with glee. Hiccup watches, beaming. He turns to Astrid, relieved.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We might not have to say goodbye after all! Toothless stands and gently leads the Light Fury toward Hiccup and Astrid. “My Home,” he COOS. She cautiously follows, uncertain.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That's it...

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Woo-hoo! Yeah! Suddenly, Ruffnut appears, landing on the dragon Grimmel gifted her.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Ruffnut? She hops off, beaming and twirling triumphantly.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Miss me?

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: How'd you escape?!  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 82.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: I annoyed them ‘til they let me go! Heh, heh. So dumb. Ruffnut tosses her braids. Hiccup and Astrid exchange a l of concern,

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Wait. Grimmel let you go? She throws them a knowing wink.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: They couldn’t handle me. (beat) See, everyone thinks that Tuffnut’s more annoying, but -- Hiccup’s eyes flare, alarmed.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: -- Wait, hold on.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Ruffnut. Focus. Were you followed? She gawks at him, blankly, then smirks.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: I never look back, Hiccup. Panic floods Hiccup’s face. He spins around toward Toothl and the Light Fury.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Toothless. Hiccup takes off toward him... «+. aS Toothless leads the Light Fury closer.

dialogues.speaker: TOOTHLESS
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a rustle in the grass spins the Light Fury arou She SNIFFS the air. Alarmed, she SHRIEKS and takes flight! But it’s too late: DART whizzes through the air and HITS her in the neck! Sh tumbles to the ground, nearly sliding off the cliff. Toothless bellows furiously, rushing toward her...  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 83.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Toothless, come back! «+. Only to discover Grimmel rising from the tall grass a of him. Before Toothless can blast, Grimmel FIRES a dart into his neck. Toothless ROARS, but immediately succumbs to the tranquilizer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SQ.2801 “Grimmel’s Surprise” ON HICCUP, running through the tall grass, panicked.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: No! Grimmel clips a ring to a long length of chain. In the background, his AIRSHIP rises into view. He grabs hold of chain as it grows taut, lifting him into the air from the chassis of the airship, standing atop his dangling, fresh captured Furies, like a prize hunter with his kill. Hiccup slows, horrified as the airship rises above him. Several Berkians race to his side. Behind them, their dra fly to the scene, ROARING aggressively. Grimmel climbs onto an outstretched arm of the airship an leers back.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: And now our little game must come to an end. The Berkian dragons close in and open their mouths to bla In response, Grimmel aims a mounted canon at the Light Fu Toothless groggily looks up to see the barbed harpoon fix squarely on his unconscious mate.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Call them off, Alpha. No reason for her to die too. Toothless looks at the arriving flock, throats aglow, awaiting his command. He ROARS a command: “Stand Down!” T dragons immediately swallow their fire, peeling back.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 84.

dialogues.speaker: SNOTLOUT
dialogues.text: What are they doing? They can totally take him!

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Not with her life is on the line! The Deathgripper scouts circle the airship, nipping at Toothless and the Light Fury. Toothless BARKS at them, tr to force them into line.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: Save your breath! The only alpha they respond to is me. Toothless turns to Hiccup, pleading and helpless. Hiccup only stare back, guilt-ridden.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, don’t feel too badly. You tried your best. But you are nothing without your dragon. Hiccup glowers in the sting of Grimmel’s words. The airship recedes. Toothless commands the dragon flock follow, as the Deathgrippers circle like sheepdogs. Hiccup chases after them, halted by the edge of the cliff

dialogues.speaker: TOOTHLESS
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON HICCUP, winded, overwhelmed, defeated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sequence 2951 - Astrid Activates Hiccup Hiccup paces at the cliff’s edge, eyeing the disappearing flock. The Gang watches from a distance, equally at a los

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Oh, that is just great! Now what? Snotlout steps forward, puffing out his chest.

dialogues.speaker: SNOTLOUT
dialogues.text: I think it’s time for number two... to become number one.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 85. Valka holds back the others with a gesture. She turns to Astrid.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: He’1l listen to you. Astrid nods and heads off toward Hiccup. She stops short, facing the open sky, as Hiccup continues to pace, worked

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Don’t say it.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: I wasn’t going to.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: I shouldn’t have dragged you out there. He wouldn’t have flown me back. She wouldn’t have followed. Astrid nods, staring ahead.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Yep.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Ugh! I feel like the same screw-up I was before I met Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: I can see that. He turns to face her, exasperated.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Are you just going to stand there and agree with everything? She shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Well, you’re right. You’re back to where you started. But I was the first to believe in you. And I've watched you doubt whether you’re worthy ever since. (beat) But you know what? I’m the person I am today because of you. I never told you that, but it’s true. You're the bravest, most stubborn, most determined knucklehead I know. (beat) (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 86.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Toothless didn’t give you that, Hiccup. He just made it...

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: -+. easier. He meets her eyes, bolstered by her stoic resolve.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: And now it’s going to be a lot harder. Hiccup considers her words.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So. What are you going to do about it?

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Probably something stupid.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: That’s the Hiccup I know. She smiles and gives her a peck of thanks the cheek. They trudge back up the hill toward the group.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Suit up, Gang. We’re going to get them back!

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: He’s lost his mind. Tuffnut grabs Hiccup by the shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Now that’s marriage material! He beams proudly.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: At last, faithful pupil. You are ready. Hiccup writhes.

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS
dialogues.text: Um... How are we gonna get our dragons back... without dragons?  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 87. Hiccup turns to him and grins, knowingly.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Trust me.

dialogues.speaker: OFF THE COAST OF NEW BERK
dialogues.text: Grimmel’s airship hovers over the sprawling armada, flank by the swirling cloud of dragons. Below, dragons are being loaded into cages. Cloudjumper, Skullcrusher, and Grump are among them. Agitated, they SN at the prodding soldiers.

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER
dialogues.text: Watch yourselves! A Solider jabs Cloudjumper with a spear.

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Move it! Cloudjumper GROWLS, threatening to attack. Above him, Toothless sees this and ROARS at him. With the Light Fury still in Grimmel’s harpoon sights, Toothless GROWLS a command: “Just do as they say.”

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: That's right, Alpha. No surprises. Cloudjumper begrudgingly complies, but SWATS the soldier with his tail as he resigns himself to the cage. More dragons land and are forced into cages.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dressed in dragon armor, the Gang peers over the edge of cliff at the armada far, far below. Their wing-suit flaps unfurled. Ruffnut gestures to hers, incredulous.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: So... jump off the cliff? In these? That’s the best you got?!  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 88.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: No. You guys are the best I’ve got.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Aw.

dialogues.speaker: I'M WI-- I'M WITH HIM
dialogues.text: Tuffnut glares at her, indignant.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Ruffnut! That was my line.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Let's go! Hiccup lowers his helmet and takes a running leap off of edge. Astrid follows.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Try to keep up! The rest of the gang leap in turn, spreading their wings gliding through the air.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Yeah! I’m doing it! EXT. OPEN SKY/OPEN WATER — CONTINUOUS Grimmel throws a lever, lowering Toothless to the deck be He struggles in the net, YOWLING back at the Light Fury. The soldiers prepare to receive Toothless as he thrashes increasing intensity. Toothless ROARS at the soldiers that surround him. They j back, nervously brandishing spears. Grimmel CHUCKLES.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: Aw, you didn’t think I’d actually hand you the Night Fury, did you? (beat) He’s mine to kill.

dialogues.speaker: GRISELDA
dialogues.text: That snake.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 89.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: I intend to finish what I started. Best of luck controlling them without an alpha.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (shouting)

dialogues.speaker: HOLD ON, TOOTHLESS
dialogues.text: Toothless’s head suddenly turns, looking hopeful. Grimmel turns, alarmed. Through the clouds that encircle New Berk, he spots a dis speck, hurtling toward him. Five others appear, further still. PUNCH IN on Hiccup, gliding from the heights of the tower island, wings extended. Astrid and the Gang follow, SCREA BATTLE CRIES. The Twins collide sloppily. Tuffnut clings desperately to Ruffnut as she kicks him.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Let go! Snotlout weaves, wildly out on control.

dialogues.speaker: SNOTLOUT
dialogues.text: Could’ve used some practice! Fishlegs flaps his undersized wing-suit flaps, trying to aloft with the extra weight of Fishmeat in his backpack.

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS
dialogues.text: I should've skipped breakfast! Grimmel whirls the mounted harpoon cannon, taking aim at squadron. But before he can line up the shot, Hiccup care into him, knocking Grimmel from his position on the airsh arm, sending him flying as the cannon spins on its gimbal Grimmel tumbles, mid-air, and grabs a rigging line, grasp desperately as it breaks his fall, leaving him swinging.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Toothless! Toothless lights up, elated. He ROARS to dragons: “NOW!” dragons break away from the soldiers below, taking to the air. On his COMMAND, Cloudjumper, Skullcrusher, and Grump race back toward the island. Hiccup collides with a billowing sail, cushioning his imp He sinks his dagger into the canvas. It tears as his own weight pulls him down toward the deck below.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 90. Astrid and the Gang stick polished landings alongside him

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Perfect timing! A hoard of soldiers rush toward the group as they stand i formation behind Hiccup. Except for Snotlout, who is dang from the rafters by his cape again.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Game faces!

dialogues.speaker: SNOTLOUT
dialogues.text: Yeah! What are you waiting for? Get in there! The gang draw weapons and charge into the fray, meeting t soldiers head-on. Above them, Toothless struggles against the net that hold him, ripping his muzzle apart with a ROAR. GRIMMEL looks down, suddenly concerned, as Toothless takes aim. Grimmel leaps out of the way as Toothless’ blast destroys one of airship arms, sending it spiraling. Grimmel clings to the falling airship and WHISTLES a command to his Deathgrippe Below, ASTRID battles a soldier on a gangway. He parries blow and corners her, raising his sword for the kill, whe

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Heads up! «+. Hiccup cuts a nearby rigging line, releasing a sail b that sweeps through and sends the soldier flying off of t gangway. Astrid beams at Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Thanks. (alarmed) Look out! Astrid throws her axe toward Hiccup, who dodges as it whi past and takes out a soldier who was about to stab Hiccup Relieved, Hiccup smiles back at Astrid.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Thanks. In a ROMANTIC MOMENT, they approach one another in SLOW MOTION. Astrid grabs a canister from Hiccup’s belt, bites the wax seal, and tosses the gas-spewing canister like a grenade to the deck below. Hiccup lights his Dragon Blade hurls it into the gas cloud. Soldiers panic and flee as..  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 91. .-. KABOOM! A fireball erupts, framing our enamored coupl Astrid WHISTLES for Stormfly and points to Hiccup, then t the sky. Stormfly swoops in and plucks Hiccup, carrying h toward... THE AIRSHIP, engulfed in flames, dropping steadily as the Deathgrippers struggle to keep it aloft. A freed Deathgripper RAMS Stormfly, knocking Hiccup out o her grasp. Hiccup rolls and dives through the airship’s inferno to get to Toothless...

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I’m coming, Toothless! +. As Grimmel shimmies down the chain to the Light Fury. twists a vial of venom into the Light Fury’s bridal, subd her into obedience.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: (to Hiccup) You still think he cares about you?! Let’s just see who he follows. He releases a latch, springing the Light Fury from her restraint. She flies off, groggy and obedient, carrying Grimmel on her back. Toothless watches, raging and struggling against his ties Hiccup races to free him.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, bud! For everything! Just as the flaming airship CRASHES into the sea, Hiccup PULLS the release latch, freeing Toothless. They EXPLODE from the epic splash, pulling a comet trail smoke. The attached Deathgrippers are dragged undersea wi the airship as Hiccup and Toothless tear off in pursuit o Grimmel and the Light Fury.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now let’s go get her! The remaining Deathgrippers head after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A soldier yells a BATTLE CRY and CHARGES the Gang. Tuffnu  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 92. clocks him from behind, then hurls his war hammer to... .-. Snotlout, who takes out another soldier, then...

dialogues.speaker: SNOTLOUT
dialogues.text: Number two, coming through! «+. tosses his hammer back to Tuffnut, who effortlessly u it to knock out yet another.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Surprise! Sorry about that!

dialogues.speaker: SNOTLOUT
dialogues.text: Come on! Snotlout rolls over the tussle and grabs the hammer, brin it down heavily to smash the lock off of a cage, freeing GOREGUTTER within. SNOTLOUT (CONT’D) Yeah! One more freed, four to go! Try to keep up! The Goregutter ROARS and takes to the air, passing Fishle engaged in combat on an upper deck.

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS
dialogues.text: I got your backs! He pushes his adversary off of the deck then, seeing his friends about to be attacked by a horde of soldiers below grabs a line and hook, and swings down to their rescue, knocking over soldiers like a wrecking ball. He lands and eyes the damage, impressed.

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yeah! It’s almost like we’re a team! The line and heavy hook swing back, knocking Fishlegs to deck and sending Fishmeat tumbling from his pouch. Ivar t Witless raises his sword to the baby.

dialogues.speaker: IVAR THE WITLESS
dialogues.text: Aw. You brought a baby to a battle?

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS
dialogues.text: Un-uh. I wouldn’t do that if I were you. They look up to reveal the Goregutter, roaring with rage he flies in to protect Fishmeat.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 93. He crashes through the masts, bringing a storm of wreckag down upon the fleeing soldiers.

dialogues.speaker: IVAR THE WITLESS
dialogues.text: Look out! Fishlegs beams, placing Fishmeat back into his pouch.

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS
dialogues.text: God, I love that dragon. The Warlords look on in shock, then turn to find themselv confronted by ERET, GOBBER, and VALKA, who have now arriv on their respective dragons. They brandish their weapons invitation.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Sorry we're late for the party. The warlords unsheathe theirs, fuming.

dialogues.speaker: CHAGHATAI KHAN
dialogues.text: You're right on time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grimmel steers the Light Fury past billowing clouds, with Hiccup and Toothless in hot pursuit. He looks back and gr

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: That’s it, that’s it! He passes a bank of storm clouds, spotting the rocky spir of New Berk in the distance. He veers off toward them. Toothless fires at Grimmel, but he rolls the Light Fury, forcing her to take the heavy impact of the blast against side. She YELPS, dropping in altitude. Toothless CALLS OUT, distraught.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: How are we going to get him off her back without hurting her?

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON THE SHIP
dialogues.text: Tuffnut surprises a soldier, dropping to the deck in fron him, sword raised.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 94.

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Fear the facial hair! The soldier swipes impulsively, slicing through Tuffnut’s “beard.” It drops away from his chin in two halves, expos Tuffnut’s baby-smooth face. He GASPS, horrified... ... then goes full Berserker -- SCREAMING and CHASING the terrified soldier across the deck... ... Where Gobber and Ragnar are trading blows.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Oh, I have missed this!

dialogues.speaker: RAGNAR THE ROCK
dialogues.text: Me too! Ragnar KNOCKS Gobber to the deck, then pauses to notice a lone Hobgobbler staring eerily from the railing. Gobber smiles.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: See that there?

dialogues.speaker: RAGNAR THE ROCK
dialogues.text: Aw. Cute.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: That’s a bad omen. You’re cursed! Suddenly, the Hobgobbler SHRIEKS, signaling a horde of Hobgobblers to pour over the railing and chew apart the d like hungry piranha. Ragnar SCREAMS and flees for his lif Gobber LAUGHS.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yes! Good on ye! He notices a Hobgobbler gnawing on his wooden peg-leg.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Eh, I guess you’re not so bad after all. Astrid silently appears behind the HELMSMAN and deftly KN HIM OUT. She then SPINS the ship’s wheel and SINKS her ax into the deck, bracing the wheel into a sharp turn. The d leans heavily to port as the flagship collides with the battleship to her left, beginning a chain reaction.

dialogues.speaker: TRAPPER
dialogues.text: Abandon ship!  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 95. Dragon cages slide across the pitched deck, colliding and furthering the chaos. Griselda and Chaghatai become trapp in one of them. Freed dragons take to the air. The Rescue Team has succee The battle is won. Astrid leads a CHEER.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SQ. 3101 - HICCUP’S SACRIFICE Grimmel leads the chase through the tall, craggy rocks of Berk. Toothless and Hiccup zigzag behind, closing in. Suddenly, the four remaining Deathgrippers appear from be a rocky spire, bombarding Hiccup and Toothless!

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Uh, we've got problems. The Deathgrippers fire volleys of acid. Hiccup and Toothl struggle to dodge. Toothless grabs a Deathgripper and hurls it into a passin column. He then blasts a passing rocky arch, burying anot Deathgripper in an explosion of boulders. But it does lit to stop them -- they’re relentless!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the ground below, the Berkians watch the pursuit with intensity.

dialogues.speaker: VIKINGS
dialogues.text: Take him down, Hiccup! The crowd cheers for their Chief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Deathgrippers clamp onto Toothless, piling on and stabbing with their stingers. Hiccup recoils on Toothless back.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: We need a better plan! And quick!  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 96. Desperate, Toothless comes up with an idea. He narrows hi eyes, concentrating. His dorsal plates split apart. Stati begins to crackle between them.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Uh, what...what are you doing? Amazed, Hiccup sees patches of Toothless' scaly skin begi turn mirror-like, including the Toothless scales on his o dragon armor. It suddenly dawns upon him what Toothless i attempting.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay... okay! He throws down his visor and tucks in. Toothless focuses ROARS, commanding lightning to arc from the stormy sky an strike them as they drop from the sky. In a flash, they disappear. The attacking Deathgrippers are ELECTROCUTED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Vikings GASP in awe as they watch the lightning blast illuminate the sky, followed by a complete disappearance Hiccup and Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grimmel looks back, baffled to see his lifeless Deathgrip dropping from the sky. He looks around frantically. Suddenly, Hiccup and Toothless re-materialize in front of at close range.

dialogues.speaker: AAGGH
dialogues.text: Hiccup leaps toward Grimmel, throwing open his wings. Gri fires a dart from his crossbow. Hiccup twists in the air, avoiding it. The dart punctures his wing just as he crash into Grimmel, knocking him off of the Light Fury's back. Hiccup looks back to see that the dart has hit Toothless! He’s going down!

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You'll kill both of us! Fighting over a dragon... that’s your plan?! With Grimmel clinging to him, and Toothless falling from sky, Hiccup makes a desperate choice.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 97.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: This is. He rips off the Light Fury's bridle (with its vial of ven tranquilizer). She shakes off the grogginess, regaining f awareness. She turns to Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Save him. He lets go, plummeting with Grimmel. Distressed, the Ligh Fury watches him, then turns to Toothless, falling unconscious. Impulsively, she races off to rescue her mat As Hiccup falls, Grimmel clings to him in vain. But Hiccu only focused on Toothless, watching as the Light Fury res him from his fall and hauls him safely to a cliff-top. Hiccup smiles, relieved. Grimmel grabs him and begins tearing apart his leather wi Hiccup tries to kick him away, but Grimmel clings to his prosthetic leg. Then Hiccup hears an impossible sound -- Toothless’ signa DIVE-BOMB WHISTLE, growing closer! He looks up to see the Light Fury racing toward him. He thinks fast and detaches his prosthetic leg, freeing himself from Grimmel...

dialogues.speaker: GRIMMEL
dialogues.text: Nooooo000! +. aS the Light Fury swoops in and grabs Hiccup at the la second. She arcs over the water as Grimmel CRASHES into t sea with an explosive SPLASH. Hiccup looks up, stunned. The Light Fury cranes her head under her belly to meet his eyes. She COOS.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: (shaken) See? I knew you’d come around.

dialogues.speaker: SQ. 3201
dialogues.text: The Light Fury carries Hiccup to the cliffs and drops him Toothless...  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 98. ++. aS the Berkians and their dragons rush over. The RESC TEAM arrives in tow, WHOOPING and CHEERING. Hiccup hops, one-legged, toward Toothless, then falls to knees and caresses him.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: (softly) Hey, good morning, Bud. There you go. Toothless comes to, opening his eyes groggily and licking Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Boy, you're full of surprises. Hiccup looks to the Light Fury, skittish and stirring in center of the crowd, but, for once, making no attempt to flee. He gently waves her over, moving away from Toothles

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He’s all yours. He smiles and hops back into Astrid’s arms, giving them r The Light Fury approaches Toothless, sniffing and nuzzlin him. He coos, licking her face. Hiccup and Astrid watch, smiling. He pulls Astrid into a Valka smiles proudly, then turns to Snotlout.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: You know, Eret may be blessed with brawn... but just between us, you have the brains. He beams, finally validated.

dialogues.speaker: SNOTLOUT
dialogues.text: Number one. Hiccup glances over at Toothless, entwined with the Light Fury. Their eyes meet. Toothless looks to the open horizo then back to Hiccup, a silent question in his gaze: “Is i time?” Hiccup understands... and nods. Toothless pauses, considering the weight of the decision, then nods back. Hiccup peels away from Astrid, taking a deep breath. He h over to Toothless, steadying himself against him.  HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 99.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: You're right, bud. It’s time. (beat) I was so busy fighting for a world that I wanted... I didn’t think about what you needed. (beat) You've looked after us for long enough. Time to look after yourselves. He smiles at the Light Fury. Astrid turns to Valka. She in turn looks to Gobber. They Astrid nods and walks to Stormfly, tears in her eyes. She lays her forehead on Stormfly’s horn.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Oh Stormfly, my good girl. Biting her lip with resolve, she removes Stormfly’s saddl dropping it on the ground. Gobber gives Grump a pat, holding back tears. He unbuckle Grump’s saddle and slides it off.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER
dialogues.text: Alright, Grumpy. Off you go. Eret nods and follows suit, removing Skullcrusher’s saddl

dialogues.speaker: ERET
dialogues.text: So long you big, ugly beast. I’1l miss you. In solidarity, the other Vikings remove the saddles from their dragons, each taking a moment to say goodbye, tears their eyes. Their dragons seem confused. Valka caresses Cloudjumper’s muzzle, whispering to him lovingly.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA
dialogues.text: Oh, Cloudjumper. Aw. Tuffnut nudges Ruffnut as they exchange heartbroken looks Hiccup and Toothless watch as the remaining Vikings remov their dragons’ saddles and say their goodbyes. He smiles, tears in his eyes. He turns to Toothless and gently takes by the muzzle. HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 100

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Go on, Bud. Lead them to the Hidden World. You’ll be safe there. Safer than you could ever be with me. Toothless looks to the Light Fury, then back to Hiccup, hesitant, conflicted. He COOS, his eyes glistening.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It’s okay. I love you too. And I want you to be free. Toothless cocks his head, eyeing him closely.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Our world doesn’t deserve you. Yet. Toothless reaches out and pulls Hiccup into an embrace. Hiccup hugs him tightly.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Go, Toothless. Hiccup lets go, and in a REVERSE MOMENT TO WHEN THEY FIRS TOUCHED, he slowly pulls his hand away from Toothless’ muzzle.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Go. Toothless stares at Hiccup in understanding. Hiccup smile tears in his eyes. With a deep breath, Toothless ROARS, commanding an exodus The dragons break away from their Vikings’ embraces and j him as he commands them to leave. The Light Fury takes flight, leading the pack. The rest of the Gang watch their dragons go, wiping away tears. The last dragons take flight, revealing that Toothless ha remained, standing at the edge of the cliff. He looks bac Hiccup one last time. Hiccup nods. Toothless returns a solemn nod, then leaps from the cliff flies off to join the flock. The Vikings gather together as the dragons recede into th distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 101 Hiccup, watching them go.

dialogues.speaker: SQ. 3401
dialogues.text: In a MONTAGE, we see: New Berk, snow-covered and now completed, far surpassing Berk's former glory. A human paradise to match the dragon Hidden World, and a monument to the bygone age of dragons Colorful houses gleam radiant in the sunlight. A giant st statue of Stoick stands in the main plaza. The entire population of New Berk is gathered. Beneath the statue, Hiccup and Astrid stand facing one another, dressed in fine clothing, as Gothi wraps their clasped hands in a ceremonial cloth. Gobber and Valka sta by, smiling proudly. Gothi touches the cloth with her staff and nods. The wedd couple kiss.

dialogues.speaker: SPITELOUT
dialogues.text: To the Chief and Chieftess! Gobber throws up his arms in a CHEER. His wooden wedding bouquet-hand flies into the crowd... and straight into Er hands. Eret looks up in surprise and smiles. Snotlout SNIFFLES, trying to hide his emotion. Tuffnut pu him into his new and improved “facial hair.”

dialogues.speaker: TUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Come. Cry into my full, thick beard. Fishlegs BURSTS INTO TEARS.

dialogues.speaker: FISHLEGS
dialogues.text: Oh, it’s so beautiful! He throws himself into Ruffnut’s arms.

dialogues.speaker: RUFFNUT
dialogues.text: Gross. (then) Okay, you win. I like sensitive guys. HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 102 Crowd CHEERS and celebration fill the plaza.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup and Astrid walk hand in hand to the wind-buffeted cliffs of New Berk. They gaze out toward a horizon no lon teeming with dragons. Astrid rests her head on Hiccup’s shoulder. Valka, Gobber, Eret and the Gang gather beside on the bluff, surrounding the Chief and Chieftess with pr CLOSE ON Hiccup’s face.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: There were dragons when I was a boy.

dialogues.speaker: SQ. 3501
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON YOUNG HICCUP, 5, eyes filled with wonder. As we PULL BACK, we realize that the boy is actually Hicc SON, 3, nestled in his grown father’s arms. OLDER HICCUP, stands on a Viking ship, his eyes keenly focused ahead as prow rises and falls in the sea spray.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Oh, there were great, grim sky dragons that nested on the cliff tops like gigantic scary birds. Little brown scuttly dragons that hunted down the mice and rats in well-organized packs. Preposterously huge sea dragons that were twenty times as big as the big blue whale. OLDER ASTRID, 30, abandons the rudder at the stern and approaches the bow, leading their DAUGHTER, 5, by the han She has large braided pigtails and skulls sewn into her f clothing -- a miniature Astrid. Together, they peer throu the mist that lies ahead. The roar of a massive waterfall grows deafening. HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 103

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Some say they crawled back into the sea, leaving not a bone nor a fang for men to remember them by. Hiccup drops the anchor, just as the faint view of the gr hole in the sea looms into view.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Others say they were nothing but folk tales to begin with. (beat) I'm okay with that. Silhouetted on a lone rock by the waterfall’s edge, Tooth lays stretched out like a proud lion standing guard. His plates perk up. He turns toward the ship. A moment later, the Light Fury sits up, followed by three black & white babies (NIGHT-LIGHTS), all watching the shi with curiosity. Toothless gets to his feet and crouches aggressively, rol his shoulders like a panther about to pounce. His back pl split and glow blue. He takes to the air, flapping toward ship. Hiccup cringes. KABOOM! Toothless lands on the prow, rock the ship heavily. Hiccup braces himself, shielding his family. The kids scamper into Astrid’s arms, frightened. She hold them close, uncertain if Toothless will recognize them. Hiccup offers an open palm.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Hey, hey there Bud. Remember me? Toothless rears up on his hind legs, glaring menacingly. Behind them, Astrid postures herself to protect her cower children.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: It’s okay. Hiccup looks back at his family, then returns to face Toothless with his hand up in surrender. Toothless SNIFFS and suddenly a rush of recognition washes over his face. throws his front claws around Hiccup, toppling him over a covering him in slobbery licks. Hiccup bursts into LAUGHT

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: I am glad to see you too, bud! HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 104 The kids squeal and bury their faces into Astrid. She LAU relieved, as Hiccup and Toothless roll around on the deck

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: He’s not going to eat your father. Hiccup wriggles from under Toothless, looking him over.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: How’s the tail holding up? Probably could use some oil and a little fine tuning. Astrid tries to calm the rattled kids.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Look, it’s okay! They’re friends! Hiccup looks back at them and waves them over.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Here.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRID
dialogues.text: Go on, it’s alright.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: Come. He won’t hurt you. Astrid urges the kids forward. They cling to one another they cautiously shuffle toward Hiccup. Toothless cocks his head, gaping with a broad, gummy smil Hiccup takes their hands and positions them, open palmed toward Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hold your hands out. Like this... (beat) That’s it. Let him come to you. Toothless sniffs and slowly approaches, touching their op palms with his snout. The kids’ utter soft GASPS of amazement. Wide-eyed smiles flood their faces.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: HTTYD: The Hidden World - 12/05/18 - Final (DeBlois) 105

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless and Hiccup rocket through the sky, spinning, tumbling, and falling through the clouds. Hiccup’s son is tucked in front of him, loving every seco The Light Fury weaves around them. Their youngsters try t keep up, following their mother like eager ducklings. The Night Lights fly right up to Toothless and Hiccup, on them peering curiously at Hiccup’s son. The boy reaches o and in response, the little dragon SQUEAKS in delight and playfully paws at his hands. Suddenly, Stormfly explodes across Toothless’ path, givin them a fright. They look up to see Astrid and their daugh laughing on her back. The young girl HOOTS and HOLLERS, pleased that they bested her dad and brother.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Legend says that when the ground quakes, or lava spews from the earth, it’s the dragons... letting us know they’re still here... Hiccup and his son exchange a mischievous grin. They crou low to the saddle and pat Toothless. He HEAVES after them

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP
dialogues.text: «+. waiting for us to figure out how to get along. Hiccup spins over Stormfly to drop his son on Astrid’s shoulders, then circles around and extends a hand to his daughter. She grabs it and leaps onto Toothless’ back. They playfully chase one another into the clouds.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Yes, the world believes the dragons are gone, if they ever existed at all. (beat) But we Berkians know otherwise. And we'll guard the secret until the time comes... when dragons can return in peace. In a last burst of dazzling color, the dragons corkscrew the blinding sun. FADE TO WHITE.
